title: Medilife
description: A medical blogsite for a client. He was from Bangladesh and wanted it for his startup.
features: User registration and login functionality
Ability for registered users to submit and publish blog articles
Categorization of blog articles by medical topics
Search functionality to easily find articles by keywords
Commenting system for readers to engage in discussions
Social media sharing options for articles
Responsive design for optimal viewing on different devices

title: Tech Store
description: An online store for selling technology products, including electronics, gadgets, and accessories.
features: Product catalog with detailed descriptions and images
User registration and authentication
Shopping cart functionality
Secure online payment integration
Order tracking and history
Customer reviews and ratings
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

title: Creative Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing the creative works and achievements of a web designer.
features: Home page with introduction and featured projects
Portfolio section with project showcases
Skills and expertise display
Resume/CV download
Contact form for inquiries
Responsive design for optimal viewing on different devices
